channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why The Future Of Trucking Litigation Is An Expert Arms Race
item.description: A quiet revolution is reshaping America’s trucking industry, and it’s about to transform how trucking accident cases are fought in courtrooms across t...

item.title: UFC Cuts Ties With Ranked Veteran And Fans Are Baffled
item.description: UFC releases No. 10-ranked Viviane Araujo despite recent win and solid résumé, raising questions about what the promotion values in veteran fighters.

item.title: ‘Tenchu’ Studio ACQUIRE And Red Dunes Games Unveil Global Co-Dev Deal
item.description: In a rare move, Japan's Acquire Corp has entered a multi-year partnership with UAE-based Red Dunes Games to co-develop a range of original IPs.

item.title: See A ‘Ghost Moon’ As Perseid Meteors Begin: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere...

item.title: India’s Economic Juggernaut On Way To Becoming The 3rd Largest Economy
item.description: India is projected to add $1 trillion to its GDP every 12–18 months to 2047. With this momentum, India is targeting a $30 trillion economy by 2047.

item.title: The Superman metaphors
item.description: Sooner or later, we are all superheroes. Superman wears a costume. As we all do. He isn’t great at time management, always focused on the urgency at h...

item.title: The four arcs

item.title: Flailing
